review_data.title: Small and mighty
review_data.content: This little cafe/bar was attached to the hotel we stayed at. We had breakfast here every morning, and loved the food and the window seat if we were lucky enough to get it. The people watching was fabulous - all walks of life! The staff...More

review_data.title: Average bar, service and really expensive for what you get
review_data.content: The place has potential, but the service was at the level we expected. The waiter was nice, but new and therefore could only provide (very) basic cocktails. The mojitos we got were average, but small and really expensive (more than 15.- for what we got...More

review_data.title: Cool place to hang out after work
review_data.content: Dada appears as a quite alternative place. Good drinks, usually crowdy in the evenings. If you are looking a place to chill after work - go there.

review_data.title: Nice, trendy bar.
review_data.content: Very trendy bar that was very popular in the evenings. Obviously quite popular among the locals. Buzzing!

review_data.title: Great location....
review_data.content: This is a great little Old Town Bar with nice outdoor seating overlooking the River. Its kind of a cutting edge place and attracts an interesting an creative crowd at night. Its operated by The Hotel Limmatblick above.

review_data.content: O bar e restaurante Dada Bar serve ótimas bebidas, desde cerveja a vinhos e bons aperitivos com acompanhamentos.
